attributes.action: Stop the National Trust and other similar body's from charging for entry into buildings and lands managed by them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The National Trust and other body's like these are charging the public for entry into buildings and land being managed by them. This is preventing normal people who are unable to afford these prices access to these sites. It is resulting in an elite class of people who are the only ones able to visit and pay to see these sites. They all belong to use the public and we should not have to pay to access them. Anyone wanting to make a donation is free to do so.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
